column2: ENGLISH
Disloyal Executor
Loyal Executor
Tyrannical Executor
Release from Prison
As executor, you have the authority to grant [This.GetFullName] a full pardon and order [This.GetHerHis] release.
[This.GetFullName] will be released from [This.Host.GetFullName]'s prison.\n
[Root.Host.Regent.GetFullName], executor of the [Root.Host.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], has granted you a full pardon and ordered your release.
Your executor, [Root.Regent.GetFullName], has granted [From.GetFullName] a full pardon and ordered [From.GetHerHis] release.
You have granted [From.GetFullName] a full pardon and ordered [From.GetHerHis] release.
[From.Host.Regent.GetFullName] has granted [From.GetFullName] a full pardon and ordered [From.GetHerHis] release.
Execute
As executor, you have the authority to have [This.GetFullName] executed for [This.GetHerHis] crimes, real or imagined.
[This.GetFullName] will be executed. This will greatly upset [This.GetHerHis] friends and loved ones!\n
[Root.Host.Regent.GetFullName], executor of the [Root.Host.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], has ordered your execution. Within a matter of hours, you will have been put to death by lethal injection.
[From.GetFullName] has been executed on your orders.
Your [GetFromFromRelation], [FromFrom.GetFullName], has been executed on the orders of [From.GetFullName]!
Your executor, [From.GetFullName], has ordered the execution of [FromFrom.GetFullName].
[From.GetFullName] has ordered the execution of [FromFrom.GetFullName].
Vassalize
As executor, you have the authority to take [This.GetFullName] and the [This.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] under your control as your direct vassal.
[This.GetFullName] will become your direct vassal.\n

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Hierarchy
We are making a major reform of the political hierarchy of the [From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. Henceforth, you will be reporting to me, rather than directly to the [From.Liege.GetTitle].
You have taken [From.GetFullName] and the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] as your direct subordinates.

Your executor, [From.GetFullName], has used [From.GetHerHis] authority to require that [FromFrom.GetFullName] and the [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] report to [From.GetHerHim], rather than to you directly.

[From.GetFullName] has used [From.GetHerHis] authority as executor to require that [FromFrom.GetFullName] and the [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] report to [From.GetHerHim], rather than to the [From.Liege.GetTitle] directly.
[FromFrom.GetFullName] is now a vassal of [From.GetFullName].
Appoint [Root.Liege.GetChancellorName]
As executor, you have the authority to appoint [This.GetFullName] as the [Root.Liege.GetChancellorName] of the [This.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].
[This.GetFullName] will choose whether to accept your offer and become [Root.Liege.GetChancellorName].

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Cabinet positions
After much consideration, I have decided to appoint you to the office of [From.Liege.GetChancellorName] of the [From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Cabinet positions
I have decided to accept your offer and serve as the new [Root.Liege.GetChancellorName] of the [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Cabinet positions
I'm afraid I must decline. I cannot serve as [Root.Liege.GetChancellorName] at this time.

[From.GetFullName] has used [From.GetHerHis] powers as executor of the [From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] to remove you from you rightful place as [From.Liege.GetChancellorName] and replace you with [FromFrom.GetFullName]!
Your executor, [From.GetFullName], has appointed [FromFrom.GetFullName] as your new [Root.GetChancellorName].
Appoint [Root.Liege.GetMarshalName]
As executor, you have the authority to appoint [This.GetFullName] as the [Root.Liege.GetMarshalName] of the [This.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].
[This.GetFullName] will choose whether to accept your offer and become [Root.Liege.GetMarshalName].

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Cabinet positions
After much consideration, I have decided to appoint you to the office of [From.Liege.GetMarshalName] of the [From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Cabinet positions
I have decided to accept your offer and serve as the new [Root.Liege.GetMarshalName] of the [Root.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

TO: [Root.GetFullName]
FROM: [From.GetFullName]
RE: Cabinet positions
I'm afraid I must decline. I cannot serve as [Root.Liege.GetMarshalName] at this time.

[From.GetFullName] has used [From.GetHerHis] powers as executor of the [From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] to remove you from you rightful place as [From.Liege.GetMarshalName] and replace you with [FromFrom.GetFullName]!
Your executor, [From.GetFullName], has appointed [FromFrom.GetFullName] as your new [Root.GetMarshalName].

[This.GetFullName] will choose whether to accept your offer of the Treasurership.
